patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,4 +1,21 @@
+def sodoi(n):
+    if n < 1 or n > 12:
+        return ''
+    elif n == 1:
+        return 'first'
+    elif n == 2:
+        return 'second'
+    elif n == 3:
+        return 'third'
+    elif n == 11:
+        return 'eleventh'
+    elif n == 12:
+        return 'twelfth'
+    else:
+        return str(n) + 'th'
+
+
 def display_verse(ngay):
     print(f"On the {sodoi(ngay)} ngay of Christmas")
     print("my true love sent to me:")
     if ngay >= 12:
